Title: Singapore may need a second LNG terminal as demand grows: EMA
Description: Energy regulatory agency the Energy Market Authority (EMA) of Singapore says the country may eventually need a second LNG import terminal to meet LNG demand as it grows beyond the existing LNG terminal’s operating capacity.
Author: CK

Title: Poland’s LNG receipts set to reach all-time high in May after halt in Russian gas imports
Description: Poland’s LNG receipts are set to reach their highest level in May, following the complete halt IN Russian gas exports to the country about a month ago.
Author: CK

Title: Equinor’s Snohvit LNG is poised to load first cargo this week as plant restarts
Description: Equinor’s 4.2 mtpa Snohvit LNG plant is poised to load its first cargo this week as the plant resumes operations, after a fire forced a complete shutdown of the plant on Sep. 28, 2020.
Author: CK
